translations: 经销商；代理商（reseller 的复数）

sentences.sentence: There are successful coupon clippers and successful securities resellers and they tend to make their money off of the unsuccessful people in the other class.
sentences.translation: 既有成功的票息剪券投资者，也有成功的债券经销商，他们倾向于从其他阶层不成功的人们身上赚钱。

sentences.sentence: Lenovo has resellers in more than 1,000 cities in China.
sentences.translation: 在中国的1000多个城市中，联想都有分销商。

sentences.sentence: The company otherwise relies on resellers to get its products into the market.
sentences.translation: 苹果公司一般通过经销商来将自家的产品推向市场。
